p.dialogue: "I wonder where the flying insects go when it rains? Don't they get hit by the raindrops?"
"A day like this is a blessing from mother nature."
"Good morning... I got this gift for you. Don't worry, I already purified it with sage incense. [428 440 444 338 207]"
"I meant to let the parrot go free, but his wing never fully healed. He seems content, though. I give him lots of attention.#$e#He told me that he's happy here."
"I never told you this... but when you first moved here I had a dream about you. I knew right then that our life-paths would intertwine.$4"
"Every moment has a unique and precious beauty... do you notice? It can be easy to forget, sometimes."
"This is my favorite spot for a morning meditation.#$e#I visualize the energy from this crystal garden flowing through my body."
"I can hear the plants talking to each other... they're so happy after today's rain!"
"How was your day, @? You look a little soggy."
"My day was very peaceful. How was yours?"
"Want some dessert? It's my special raw, gluten-free version, sweetened only with cactus syrup.[232 234 223 220]$h"
"Does the sound of rain ever put you in a trance?"
"Another beautiful day on %farm farm... I have faith that something good will happen today!$h"
"Here, take this. It's for you. [428 440 444 338 207 395 749]"
"Hey, someone must've gotten a good night of sleep... you look fresh this morning.$h"
"My horoscope for the day isn't too good... but I'm going to make the best of it, as always. Let's get to work!"
"Ughh... *gurgle*... I ate too many bran muffins for breakfast.$s"
"Is that a new hole I see in your shirt? I can sew that up for you, no problem."
"Welcome home, @. I hope you had a wonderful day."
"Is it bed time already? My, the day just floated away from me again.$u"
"Ah, that aroma! It can only be you.$h#$e#It's a good smell."
"I swept the whole house, washed the windows, dusted, and cleaned the fridge. It was a very productive day!"
"I love getting up early. There's a certain freshness to the air and the wildlife is much more active."
"What's on the agenda today, dear?"
"Oooh! Ooh! I saw another one!$h#$e#I'm counting squirrels."
"A little sunlight is good for you. Just don't get crispy, okay?"
"Good morning! I was wondering when you'd finally roll out of bed!$h#$e#It's okay, @... you deserve a good night of rest."
"I hope we can raise %kid1 to be kind and considerate. That's more important than getting A's in school."
"Is one child enough, or should we raise another?#$e#I guess we'll just see where fate leads us."
"I lit a pale green candle and shook a sprig of baby-mint over %kid1. That should ward off any dangerous spirits."
"A big house, two kids and a parrot... I have my hands full!"
"Well, %kid2 certainly has your hair...$u"
"Oh, I already fed the kids their organic quinoa puffs with goat milk. You just focus on the farm!"
"This is so fun to live together! I always thought I'd be single my whole life."
"It was our destiny to be together... I believe that with all my heart!"
"Thanks for taking me into your home. I love this new life.$4"
"Our vibrational energies are perfectly in tune. Can't you feel it?"
"I was just admiring my wedding amulet... The shell is beautiful! I can feel the pure blue energy radiating from it.$l"

"I had another dream about us last night. We had climbed to the top of a crystal tree, looking down on the most lush and beautiful meadow. I keep having this dream.#$e#I don't know what it means, but I feel that it's a good omen."
"I hope you'll still like me when I grow old and my hair turns to a dull, faded steel."
"I feel uninspired today.$s"
"I'm going to visit town today, and later on I'm going to help out at the saloon. Have a nice day."
"My day went well... it's good to get out of the house now and then."
"My friends, the plants, have come back to life. I feel content."
"Happy new year, honey. Let's make this a special one.$4"
"Hmm... I'm thinking maybe a salad of fresh foraged greens for dinner tonight?"
"The energy in our bodies fluctuate just as the seasons do. Understanding your own unique rhythym is the first step to inner harmony."
"May Yoba bless you on this lovely day.$7"
"The year's already half-way over. Can you believe it?"

"Our bodies are naturally in tune with the seasons. This light and color of fall compels us to prepare for the barren winter.#$e#To our distant ancestors, this feeling was encompassing and vital. For us, it only barely peeks through the noise of modern life."
"On a day like this, I have a craving for cinnamon, nutmeg, clove, and cardamom."
"*sigh*... Why does there have to be war and hatred in the world?$s"
"I can't help but think of all the poor, frozen squirrels out there right now.$s"
"I'm feeling excited for a new year of farming, @!$h"
"I drank a super-food smoothie this morning and I feel aaah-mazing!$h"
"Phew! It's hot but it feels great, doesn't it?#$e#Maybe we'll see some wild parrots today."
"Whoops, my hair is frozen solid again.$s"
"I'm going to spend some time with the parrot today. It breaks my heart that he'll never fly again.$u"
